duties_responsibilities.duty: Find and develop qualified leads through cold calling and convert them into prospects and customers.
Engage prospects, present the company value proposition, and strive for win-win solutions that expand client relationships.
Weekly onsite administration day at Corporate Office in Portland to review call logs, maintain customer profiles, and follow up on leads.
Continuously keep the sales pipeline full of deals at various stages, including fresh/new leads, mid and late-stage sales targets.
Advocate for both the company and the customer, always furthering relationships and finding win-win solutions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Logistics, or Supply Chain (preferred)
